description: Dashboard to provide a protocol specific view of the activity on an Isilon cluster monitored using the Isilon Data Insights Connector available at https://github.com/Isilon/isilon_data_insights_connector.

options.content:
* Use the pull down at the very top left of the page (next to the spiral icon) to select which dashboard you want to look at.
* Use the cluster and other pull downs to select the cluster and protocol(s) of interest.  A seperate chart will be displayed for each protocol chosen.
* Use highlight with your mouse the time period you want to zoom into or use the pull downs at the top right to select specific time periods.
* Note that by default the dates and time displayed are in your browserâ€™s time zone, not the source cluster.   You can get it to display in UTC via the settings under the little gear symbol at the top of the page.
* If there is a legend displayed you can click on elements within it to hide or display items, etc.
* Click on the title of the chart and then the horizontal bars icon at the left to show/hide the legend and get a CSV export of the data.
* The charts are displaed to connect the data points and the null values so drop-outs will look weird.

panels.title: Welcome to the Isilon Protocol Detail Dashboard for $cluster

targets.query: SELECT 100.0 - mean("value") FROM "ifs.percent.avail" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT 1.0 - mean("value")  / 1000 FROM "cluster.cpu.idle.avg" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("time_avg") /1000 FROM "cluster.protostats.$protocol.total" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("time_avg") /1000 FROM "cluster.protostats.$protocol.total" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "node.clientstats.active.$protocol" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "node.clientstats.active.$protocol" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("op_rate") FROM "cluster.protostats.$protocol.total" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("op_count") FROM "cluster.protostats.$protocol" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "op_name", "class_name" fill(null)
SELECT sum("op_count") FROM "cluster.protostats.$protocol" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("in_rate") FROM "cluster.protostats.$protocol.total" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("out_rate") FROM "cluster.protostats.$protocol.total" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("out_rate") + mean("in_rate") FROM "cluster.protostats.$protocol.total" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("in_rate") FROM "cluster.protostats.$protocol" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "op_name", "class_name" fill(null)
SELECT mean("out_rate") FROM "cluster.protostats.$protocol" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "op_name", "class_name" fill(null)
SELECT mean("time_avg") FROM "cluster.protostats.$protocol.total" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("time_max") FROM "cluster.protostats.$protocol.total" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("time_min") FROM "cluster.protostats.$protocol.total" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Average Latency for all $protocol Operations for $cluster

panels.description: cluster.protostats.$prototcol.time_avg broken out by class_name and op_name

targets.query: SELECT mean("time_avg")  / 1000 FROM "cluster.protostats.$protocol" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "class_name",  "op_name" fill(null)

panels.title: Average Latency by $protocol Operation for $cluster

panels.description: cluster.protostats.$prototcol.time_max broken out by class_name and op_name

targets.query: SELECT mean("time_max")  / 1000 FROM "cluster.protostats.$protocol" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "class_name", "op_name" fill(null)

panels.title: Maximum Latency by $protocol Operation for $cluster

title: PowerScale Protocol Detail
